text: Allah aur uss kay rasool ki taraf say logon ko baray hajj kay din saaf itlaa hai kay Allah mushrikon say beyzaar hai aur uss ka rasool bhi agar abb bhi tum tauba kerlo to tumharay haq mein behtar hai aur agar tum roo gardaani kero to jaan lo kay tum Allah ko hara nahi saktay. Aur kafiron ko dukh ki maar ki khabar phonca dijiye
